description:
Alterations and change of use of ground and first floors from office/storage (B1/B8) to restaurant and bar (A3) use with ancillary retail use, first floor extension and external alterations. (Observations to Corporation of London). 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  NS/NMc/P1247/01; PS00.01/-; EP00.01;                         01.01; ES.00.02, EWE.00.01,                         EEE.00.01; ESE.00.01; EO1.01/-;                         P00.01/C; P01.01/C.
decision_conditions: There are no objections to the proposed change of use. However, the design and appearance of the painted beam element is inappropriate and would be detrimental to the character and appearance of the vicinity, the setting of Charterhouse Square into which it faces and the wider Charterhouse Square Conservation Area.
